# Audit Reports

This directory contains all audit reports, code reviews, and safety assessments for BlazeDB.

## Safety & Code Audits

- **SAFETY_AUDIT.md** - Comprehensive safety audit (fatalError removal, force unwraps, error handling)
- **CODE_AUDIT_REPORT.md** - General code quality audit
- **CODE_AUDIT_FIXES.md** - Fixes applied based on code audit
- **ARM_CODE_REVIEW.md** - ARM-optimized code review
- **ARM_CODE_REVIEW_COMPLETE.md** - ARM code review completion status

## Protocol & Performance Audits

- **BLAZEBINARY_PROTOCOL_AUDIT.md** - BlazeBinary protocol audit
- **BLAZEBINARY_PROTOCOL_AND_IO_AUDIT.md** - Protocol and I/O audit
- **PERFORMANCE_AUDIT.md** - Performance analysis and audit
- **SIZE_AUDIT.md** - Database size and storage audit

## Security Audits

- **SECURITY_AND_TESTING_AUDIT.md** - Security and testing audit
- **SECURITY_LINUX.md** - Linux-specific security audit
- **DISTRIBUTED_SYNC_AUDIT.md** - Distributed sync security audit

## Platform Audits

- **FINAL_LINUX_AUDIT.md** - Final Linux compatibility audit
- **LINUX_COMPATIBILITY_AUDIT.md** - Linux compatibility assessment
- **FILE_LOCKING_AUDIT_REPORT.md** - File locking mechanism audit

## Comprehensive Reports

- **COMPREHENSIVE_AUDIT_REPORT.md** - Complete project audit
- **BLAZEDB_AUDIT_REPORT.md** - Main BlazeDB audit report
- **BLAZEDB_GAPS_AND_ISSUES_AUDIT.md** - Gaps and issues assessment
- **REAUDIT_AFTER_HARDENING.md** - Re-audit after hardening phase

## Logging & Error Handling

- **LOGGING_AUDIT_REPORT.md** - Logging system audit
- **FATALERROR_REMOVAL.md** - Documentation of fatalError removal

## Refactoring

- **REFACTORING_SUMMARY.md** - Summary of refactoring work

---

**Note:** These audits document the evolution of BlazeDB's safety, security, and code quality. They serve as historical records and references for future improvements.
